Spa.title: Massages
Spa.description: Unwind and relax with a variety of massage treatments, including Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, and sports massages.

details.title: Swedish Massage
details.description: A classic full-body massage using long, soothing strokes to promote relaxation and relieve muscle tension.

details.title: Deep Tissue Massage
details.description: A therapeutic massage that targets deep muscle layers and helps alleviate chronic pain and tightness.

details.title: Hot Stone Massage
details.description: A massage that uses heated stones to loosen tight muscles, increase circulation, and create a sense of deep relaxation.

details.title: Sports Massage
details.description: A massage designed to help athletes recover from and prevent sports-related injuries.

Spa.title: Facials
Spa.description: Rejuvenate your skin and improve your complexion with our variety of luxurious facials.

details.title: Signature Facial
details.description: A personalized facial treatment tailored to your specific skin concerns and needs.

details.title: Anti-Aging Facial
details.description: A facial treatment designed to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and improve skin texture and elasticity.

details.title: Detoxifying Facial
details.description: A deep-cleansing facial that removes impurities and improves the overall health and appearance of your skin.

details.title: Hydrating Facial
details.description: A facial that replenishes moisture and hydration in dry, dull skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and radiant.

Spa.title: Body Treatments
Spa.description: Indulge in a variety of body treatments designed to pamper, soothe, and rejuvenate the skin.

details.title: Salt Scrub
details.description: A full-body exfoliation treatment that removes dead skin cells and leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and revitalized.

details.title: Body Wrap
details.description: A relaxing body treatment that involves being wrapped in warm, nourishing products to improve skin tone, hydration, and firmness.

details.title: Aromatherapy Bath
details.description: Soak in a luxurious bath infused with essential oils to promote relaxation and improve overall wellness.

Wellness.title: Massages
Wellness.description: Choose from a variety of massages, including Swedish, deep tissue, hot stone, and sports massages. Our experienced therapists will help you unwind and release tension.

Wellness.title: Yoga and Meditation
Wellness.description: Join us for daily yoga and meditation classes, led by experienced instructors. Find inner peace and improve your physical and mental health.

Wellness.title: Sauna and Steam Room
Wellness.description: Relax in our sauna and steam room, designed to promote detoxification and improve circulation. Take a break from the outside world and treat yourself to some well-deserved pampering.

Wellness.title: Fitness Center
Wellness.description: Stay active during your stay with our state-of-the-art fitness center. Our facility is equipped with a variety of cardio and weight training equipment, as well as free weights.
